trends: There have been 47 other sightings in Cleveland
There were no other sightings in Cleveland on or around September 13th 2006
Summary: Object was staggering in the sky then sped off with incredible acceleration.
divs: Sighting DetailsI was outside of my house on my driveway around 2:15 am when I found Myself looking north toward the city amazed by the aura of light it produced. I immediately noticed a very bright and somewhat distant l Ball of light slowly moving in the sky. For the first few seconds, I dismissed it, it resembled a meteor or "shooting star". There were no audible frequencies emitted. Then the object began to stutter around in a relatively small radius from my perspective. After about a minute the ball of light just sped off into space at a very accute angle. I would estimate the object accelerated from 0 to several thousend miles per hour in less than half a second. I remember thinking "finally I have seen one". If only it were closer to me I may have been able to make out it's color. It emitted a similar wavelength of light similar to a Xenon headlight of a bmw. Very beautiful.
